name: The Red Odyssey: Authorized Battlezone Mission Pack
name_original: The Red Odyssey: Authorized Battlezone Mission Pack
description:
The Red Odyssey: Authorized Battlezone Mission Pack is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Team Evolve. It was originally released in 1999. It was published by Macmillan Digital Publishing USA.
The Red Odyssey: Authorized Battlezone Mission Pack is available on PC.
